name: Arthas
title: The Lich King
description: A Tank who is proficient against melee Physical Attackers, slowing them.

primary.name: Death Coil
primary.description:
Deals 170.56 damage to target enemy.

Can be self-cast to heal for 272.48 Health.

primary.name: Howling Blast
primary.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 70.72 damage.

primary.name: Frozen Tempest
primary.description: Deals 41.6 damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed and Attack Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%.

primary.name: Army of the Dead
primary.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 277.68 Health.

primary.name: Summon Sindragosa
primary.description: Deals 239.2 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

primary.name: Frostmourne Hungers
primary.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 99 increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.questDescription: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.
1.rewardDescription: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.questDescription: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.
1.rewardDescription:
After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.

After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.
4.questDescription: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.
4.rewardDescription: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 3.9% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 277.68 Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 239.2 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description:
Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
